title: Fix app loading failure after deployment

requirements.text: Diagnose and fix the root cause preventing the application from loading or rendering any content on the webpage
acceptanceCriteria: The application loads successfully in the browser
The storefront page renders with hero section and item grid
No JavaScript errors appear in the browser console

requirements.text: Verify the backend actor is responding correctly to frontend requests and all canister endpoints are accessible
acceptanceCriteria: Backend canister methods respond to queries
No runtime errors in backend actor initialization
CRUD operations for items and categories function correctly

requirements.text: Ensure the frontend routing and React component rendering pipeline is functioning after the Version 19 deployment
acceptanceCriteria: TanStack Router initializes and renders routes correctly
React Query provider and hooks work without errors
All page components mount and display content
Internet Identity authentication flow is operational

constraints: Preserve all existing functionality from Version 19
Do not modify the single-actor backend architecture
Maintain compatibility with deployed Stripe integration
Keep existing shape category system and admin features intact
nonGoals: Redesigning the UI or user experience
Changing the technology stack or dependencies
